sentences: Ta kutsus mind oma juubeliks pidu peale.
Meie kutsutakse igal aastal suve alguses festivalile.
context: The word 'kutsunud' is the past tense (specifically, the perfect participle form) of the Estonian verb 'kutsuda', which means 'to invite', 'to summon', or 'to call'. In this form, it functions as an adjective meaning 'invited' or can be used with auxiliary verbs to form compound tenses. It agrees in number and gender with the subject of the sentence.
